title.narrative: Seed funding security and justice accountability (CSSF) through Multilateral and CSOs

description.narrative: This activity (Seed funding security and justice accountability (CSSF) through Multilateral and CSOs) is a component of Zimbabwe Conflict, Stability and Security Fund (CSSF) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £30,000. This component benefits Zimbabwe, and works in the following sector(s): Legal and judicial development, Ending violence against women and girls, Security system management and reform, Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution. , with the following implementing partners: United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS). The start date is 08-06-2020 and the end date is 30-12-2021.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
